Uses of Package
oracle.adf.view.rich.activedata

  • Packages that use oracle.adf.view.rich.activedata 
    Package Description
    oracle.adf.view.rich.activedata  
    oracle.adf.view.rich.context  
    oracle.adf.view.rich.render  
  • Classes in oracle.adf.view.rich.activedata used by oracle.adf.view.rich.activedata 
    Class and Description
    ActiveComponentContext
    Called by Renderers that want to support active data on their attributes.
    ActiveComponentEncoder
    Called during active data on a component to encode actice data updates, insertions and removals for a component residing on the user agent.
    ActiveComponentEncoder.CreateBy
    The possible aditional operations after method encodeClientScrip is called
    ActiveDataEncoder
    ActiveDataEncoder is the abstract base class for all encoders that encode active data.
    ActiveModelContext
    Called by ActiveDataModel implementations whenever a model attribute which supports active data is dereferenced.
    ActiveUpdateContext
    ActiveCellEncoder is the abstract class for all encoders that encode active data for a component contained in a container, the component is registered through the container to support active data, like an active output text column in a table.
    AutoPPRFilter
    AutoPPRFilter is the filter class used when registering a component's interest in whether an ActiveDataEvent should result in the component being rerendered automatically on the next render phase.
    ClientComponentCellEncoder
    ActiveCellEncoder that delegates to a ClientComponent to handle attribute updates, rerendering the content if there is no ClientComponent.
    DataUpdateManager
    The DataUpdateManager class controls the registration and deregistration of components for both automatic PPR update and for active data
    DataUpdateManagerFactory
    Returns the instance of the DataUpdateManager to use for this request
    PPRingActiveCellEncoder 
  • Classes in oracle.adf.view.rich.activedata used by oracle.adf.view.rich.context 
    Class and Description
    DataUpdateManager
    The DataUpdateManager class controls the registration and deregistration of components for both automatic PPR update and for active data
  • Classes in oracle.adf.view.rich.activedata used by oracle.adf.view.rich.render 
    Class and Description
    ActiveComponentEncoder
    Called during active data on a component to encode actice data updates, insertions and removals for a component residing on the user agent.
